item.title: True love and devotion...
item.description:
True love and devotion...

The Kansas man noticed his young son, who's battling brain cancer, was self-conscious about the scar left behind on his head after a surgery. So Marshall got a tattoo that matches his son's scar. item.title: Fresh Country Air
item.description:
Fresh Country Air

Not far from the hustle and bustle of any city across our nation lies for many an unexplored land. Growing up in a rural area for most of my life I took this all for granted.

item.title: Woman sings the National Anthem at the Lincoln Memorial
item.description:
Woman sings the National Anthem at the Lincoln Memorial

Woman sings the National Anthem at the Lincoln Memoriaml, A Florida woman stunned the crowd at the Lincoln Memorial in Washington, D.C. last week with her powerful rendition of "The Star-Spangled Banner," It begins with a man encouraging the woman identified as Star Genleah Swain to sing "The Star-Spangled Banner" in the monument.
